oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cabinet card of Andrew Baxter
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cabinet card of Civil War veteran, Andrew Baxter, 21st Tenn. Cav. Regt., CSA. The following is inscribed on the back of the image: "Andrew Baxter my uncle lost his arm in Civil War he is the father of Miss Ethel Baxter a head nurse at the Baptist Hospital Memphis.
